notes.text:
This update fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2015-6908. Passing a crafted packet to the function  ber_get_next(),
    an attacker may cause a remote denial of service, crashing the OpenLDAP server (bsc#945582).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The ber_get_next function in libraries/liblber/io.c in OpenLDAP 2.4.42 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (reachable assertion and application crash) via crafted BER data, as demonstrated by an attack against slapd.
